mapper.select: SELECT MENU_ID , DRCTRY_AT , UPPER_MENU_ID , SJ , DC , WEB_PATH , DP , SORT_ORDR , USE_AT , REGISTER_ID , REGIST_DT , UPDUSR_ID , UPDT_DT FROM HONGGO.HG_MENU
SELECT MENU_ID , DRCTRY_AT , UPPER_MENU_ID , SJ , DC , WEB_PATH , DP , SORT_ORDR , USE_AT , REGISTER_ID , REGIST_DT , UPDUSR_ID , UPDT_DT FROM HONGGO.HG_MENU WHERE MENU_ID = #{menuId}
